name: Fortle
description:
You are the last turtle keeper on the floating island.

Made for https://itch.io/jam/scorejam13.

Goal & rules

Meteors are bad.
One touch - you are dead.
Try to survive.
Keep tortoises alive.

Controls:
  • W-S-A-D - Movement
  • J - Whistle to move the turtles
  • K - Open build menu
Credits:
